Package com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.geometry.opengl

Class GLBatchGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.geometry.opengl.GLBatchGeometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HitTestable, ClampToGroundControl, LollipopControl, MapControl, GLMapBatchable2, GLMapRenderable, Releasable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GLBatchGeometryCollection, GLBatchLineString, GLBatchPoint
    @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.2",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="5.5")
public abstract class GLBatchGeometry
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLMapRenderable, GLMapBatchable2, HitTestable, LollipopControl, ClampToGroundControl
    Deprecated.
    deferred to C++ implementation by way of GLBatchGeometryFeatureDataStoreRenderer.SPI

      • isNadirClampEnabled
